read-write:
@property (readwrite) type bar';'
and then inside @implementation
@synthesize bar';'
read-only:
@property (readonly) type bar';'
and then inside @implementation
@synthesize bar';'

column1: Perl<ref>these examples need the Class::Accessor module installed</ref>

read-write: member val Bar = value with get  set

read-only: level-number bar clauses PROPERTY «WITH» NO SET.
write-only: level-number bar clauses PROPERTY «WITH» NO GET.
